eyBuildLib API Reference : eyBuildLib

ebutil

NAME

ebutil - util tools

ROUTINES

list_environ( ) - list environment variables
strcmpin( ) - compare strings, ignoring case
memshow( ) - list the data of specified memory area
trimspace( ) - trim space and tab
get_filename( ) - get filename from full path
isblankstr( ) - check a string is NULL or only include spaces/tabs
ebI2A( ) - convert number into a string (decimal number format)
make_c_name( ) - make name like C function/variable name

DESCRIPTION

util tools library

INCLUDE

ebutil.h

SYNOPSIS

int list_environ ()

DESCRIPTION

this routine is to list environment variables

RETURNS

OK/ERROR

NAME

strcmpin( ) - compare strings, ignoring case

SYNOPSIS

int strcmpin
    (
    char * s1,
    char * s2,
    int    n
    )

DESCRIPTION

this routine compare strings, ignoring case

RETURNS

same as strcmp

eyBuildLib : Routines

memshow( )

NAME

memshow( ) - list the data of specified memory area

SYNOPSIS

int memshow
    (
    void * pstart,
    size_t size
    )

DESCRIPTION

this routine list the data of specified memory area with 2byte width.

RETURNS

OK/ERROR

SEE ALSO

ebutil

eyBuildLib : Routines

trimspace( )

NAME

trimspace( ) - trim space and tab

SYNOPSIS

char * trimspace
    (
    char * * ppstart,
    char *   *ppend
    )

DESCRIPTION

this routine jump over header space/tab, and fill \0 at tail

RETURNS

pointer to the new start address

SEE ALSO

ebutil

eyBuildLib : Routines

get_filename( )

NAME

get_filename( ) - get filename from full path

SYNOPSIS

char * get_filename
    (
    char * fullname
    )

DESCRIPTION

this routine return the next address of last / or \, or the start address if not found

RETURNS

pointer to filename

SEE ALSO

ebutil

eyBuildLib : Routines

isblankstr( )

NAME

isblankstr( ) - check a string is NULL or only include spaces/tabs

SYNOPSIS

BOOL isblankstr
    (
    char * pstr
    )

DESCRIPTION

this routine checks a string is NULL or only include spaces/tabs

RETURNS

TRUE if is NULL or only include spaces/tabs, othersize FALSE

SEE ALSO

ebutil

eyBuildLib : Routines

ebI2A( )

NAME

ebI2A( ) - convert number into a string (decimal number format)

SYNOPSIS

char * ebI2A
    (
    int num
    )

DESCRIPTION

this routine is to convert number into a string (decimal number format), it allocate a buffer dynamicly, so you should free this buffer with free( ) manually.

RETURNS

a number string, or "" if allocate memory fault

SEE ALSO

ebutil

    (

    )

DESCRIPTION

this routine is to make name like C function/variable name

RETURNS

pointer to new name
